name: Cooking Games Burger HOT Fast Food Restaurant Chef
name_original: Cooking Games Burger HOT Fast Food Restaurant Chef
description:
Cooking Games Fever Best Chef is the newest addition to our food maker games for girls,you will learn how to cook tasty dishes with chef Kim and create the most delicious food combinations to serve your customers around the world!Start your adventure in 4 places all over the world and become the best chef on the globe!Start your kitchen business today and become as famous as Oliver or Ramsay or Nigella and dash the dinner everything in your way!!Defeat your fever cooking now and start to cook tasty dish,meals and desserts in every country in the world!You will find famous cuisines like chinese restaurans,oriental restaurans and even fast food games!It will teach you how to cook delicious dishes and manage your own restaurant and become a master top Chef in kitchen!The dash of cooking will make you the master cooking and become world chef!Learn all the cooking techniques available and prepare the best bio ingredients!Use all the kitchen appliances from cake maker to popcorn maker and coffee makers to pizza ovens and to rice cookers and defeat your rivals!

How To Play:
- Join us and Makes your favorite Ice Cream Maker in your mobile device!
- Help Masha and her friends to cook the perfect dash the dinner and dish!
- Women adore to stay in the kitchen and prepare the perfect dash the dinner for the loved ones!
- Chef Gordon is the boss and you have to do what he says, otherwise your meals and cookies will be burnt!
- Become the world number one chef and build your own trademark in food!
- Steal some really good recipes for preparing hot dogs or tacos and french fries with ketchup toppings!
- Of course,don't forget about pizza games and you'll love the pizza maker games too!
- Multiple challenges, puzzles of different levels and hamburgers to serve the customers with!
- Addicting restaurant time management game and hamburger management!
- Serve fresh hot dog with mustard and Ketchup to make more money!
- The fever cooking is strong, so try to collaborate with your apprentices like a real cooking chef!
